info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 5:26PM MDT until June 02 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Socorro County in central New Mexico... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 526 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles southwest of Bosque Del Apache Refuge, or 24 miles east of Monticello, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Socorro County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
